Package httpserver

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HttpService
    Interface defining what services HTTP server must implement
    Server
    Interface defining Server classes
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractServer
    Base server class
    HttpServer
    HTTP Server class
    HttpServerReader
    Class used for getting data from client
    HttpServiceAdapter
    Additional abstraction level for HttpService
    Main  
    OrdinaryHttpService
    Class handling responses and requests for single connection
    PropertiesReader
    Reads properties from a property file
    Request
    Class representing client request
    Response
    Class used for forming and sending response to the client
    ServerFormatter
    Formatter used for formatting log file
    ServerLogs
    Class used for accessing initializing and accessing logger
    ShutdownSocket
    A thread used for shutting down the server
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    OrdinaryHttpService.Method
    Enumeration for methods
